channel.title: [Shard]Hydra
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/thuyR.png[/img]
[COLOR="orange"][B]Base:[/B][/COLOR] Shard Revolutions [COLOR="orange"][B]Client:[/B][/COLOR] RuneLimited [COLOR="orange"][B]Programmer(s):[/B][/COLOR] Flight [COLOR="orange"][B]Release date:[/B][/COLOR] Whenever I feel that the server is at a playable stage.
[COLOR="orange"][B]Info:[/B][/COLOR] Using a stable base, the ultimate goal is to create a stable and enjoyable server. I look at the other available servers, to be fair the majority of them are horrible and looks the same as the last one. Now the actual plan for the server is to attempt to base it around PvP while still remaining economical, which means incorporating the need for skills and/or training of slayer etc. to get the items required to PK. There will be plenty of mini-games to keep the players interested if they wish to do otherwise, along with a decent amount of skills and boss fights(instanced) as well as normal bosses.
[COLOR="orange"][b]Notes[/b]:[/COLOR] - Don't mind the other grayish water texture a few pictures down(fishing), it was just a test and it was too dark. - All water+lava textures flow.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rVOt3.png[/img] [IMG]http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2411/5709153503_1b84e8edf2_b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BjlL8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NmwsX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7qlaE.png[/img] [IMG]http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3119/5709005597_56cfcb738d_b.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EQCQu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wCbO2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kMgto.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XztW4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xox9l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A1ziU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MbKNx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZTG8b.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OrJg9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HnSRP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P8AUm.png[/img]
[SPOILER="Training skills"] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9MWcB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/n9Kas.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

item.title: [Shard]Hydra
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

[ul][*]Loaded a few new items

  • So far all Chaotic weaponry, and colored Dark bows.
    - No picture for Chaotics as rotations aren’t configured as of now
  • Still deciding what items to add from higher revisions
  • Decided that Chaotics will not be allowed in the wilderness.
    [*]Updated rendering
  • Items and models aren’t rendered in the 317 client as smoothly as they are 400+ (you’d notice the scratches on ghostly items, portals, shadows of NPC’s (eg. Aviansies) and so on), updated to 508(?) rendering thanks to Badger.[/ul]
    [CENTER]
    rVOt3.png764×500

    BjlL8.png762×497
    [/CENTER]

On rendering, here’s how it looks before and after(images taken by Backbone):

9iy2bs.png763×319

oixe6s.png763×319

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Hydra
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:12, topic:394312”][quote author=Flight link=topic=491498.msg3594288#msg3594288 date=1304914705]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=491498.msg3594193#msg3594193 date=1304907510]=
I am sure you would use a webclient and jar and stuff but even those can be ripped and remade into a client. Runelimited had a noclip feature if I remember correctly.

I honestly have no idea what you’re on about lol. Noclip is a term used to describe the state where you can walk through objects/walls/barriers. So… ?

Looks nice.

Thanks man.
[/quote]Indeed and have you took it out of the client.java file in the client?

It’s in the client initially for testing purposes… only administrators can use it.
[/quote]

This is only true in an unedited client. Someone can edit the client so that the command can be used by anyone.

However, you can also protect against this if you check for clipping server-side as well.[/quote]Yeah that is what I was getting at Zyle.

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard]Hydra
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Flight, post:11, topic:394312”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=491498.msg3594267#msg3594267 date=1304913099]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=491498.msg3594193#msg3594193 date=1304907510]=
I am sure you would use a webclient and jar and stuff but even those can be ripped and remade into a client. Runelimited had a noclip feature if I remember correctly.

I honestly have no idea what you’re on about lol. Noclip is a term used to describe the state where you can walk through objects/walls/barriers. So… ?

Looks nice.

Thanks man.
[/quote]Indeed and have you took it out of the client.java file in the client?
[/quote]
It’s in the client initially for testing purposes… only administrators can use it.[/quote]

This is only true in an unedited client. Someone can edit the client so that the command can be used by anyone.

However, you can also protect against this if you check for clipping server-side as well.

Read full topic

Looks good from the pics. Keep it up.

item.description:
@Flight wrote:

[CENTER]

[COLOR=“orange”]Base:[/COLOR] Shard Revolutions
[COLOR=“orange”]Client:[/COLOR] RuneLimited
[COLOR=“orange”]Programmer(s):[/COLOR] Flight
[COLOR=“orange”]Release date:[/COLOR] Whenever I feel that the server is at a playable stage.

[COLOR=“orange”]Info:[/COLOR]
Using a stable base, the ultimate goal is to create a stable and enjoyable server. I look at the other available servers, to be fair the majority of them are horrible and looks the same as the last one.
Now the actual plan for the server is to attempt to base it around PvP while still remaining economical, which means incorporating the need for skills and/or training of slayer etc. to get the items required to PK. There will be plenty of mini-games to keep the players interested if they wish to do otherwise, along with a decent amount of skills and boss fights(instanced) as well as normal bosses.

[COLOR=“orange”]Notes:[/COLOR]

  • Don’t mind the other grayish water texture a few pictures down(fishing), it was just a test and it was too dark.
  • All water+lava textures flow.
